title: Create post successfully with valid input and authenticated user
description: Verify that an authenticated user can create a new post with valid title, content, and category, and that the author attribute is securely set on the server side.

steps.description: Authenticate user session
Submit createPost request with valid title, content, and category
Check the server adds correct author attribution from session
Verify response redirects to category page with 303 status
Confirm UI updates to display the newly created post without manual refresh

title: Prevent post creation when unauthenticated
description: Verify that a createPost request from an unauthenticated user is blocked with the appropriate error message.

steps.description: Attempt to create a post without user authentication
Check for 'User not authenticated' error response

title: Reject post creation with missing required fields
description: Verify that creating a post with empty title or content fields results in validation errors before database insertion.

steps.description: Authenticate user session
Submit createPost request with empty title field
Verify validation error for missing title is returned
Submit createPost request with empty content field
Verify validation error for missing content is returned

title: Reject post creation with unknown category
description: Verify that post creation with a category not recognized by validation rules is rejected or ignored according to system design.

steps.description: Authenticate user session
Attempt to create post with an invalid/unknown category value
Confirm validation error or rejection response is returned

title: Fetch posts filtered by valid category
description: Verify that public users can fetch lists of posts filtered by a valid category, and that response payload excludes unnecessary fields to optimize performance.

steps.description: Send getPostsByCategory request with a valid category parameter
Verify 200 response with list of posts only from requested category
Verify the response payload contains optimized fields, avoiding heavy/unnecessary data

title: Handle fetch posts by category with unknown category
description: Verify that fetching posts by an unknown category either returns empty results or returns an error according to design.

steps.description: Send getPostsByCategory request with an invalid category parameter
Check for empty list or validation error per system behavior

title: Fetch individual post details by valid ID
description: Verify that public users can fetch details of an existing post given a valid post ID, and verify details are current and accurate.

steps.description: Send getPostById request with valid UUID of an existing post
Verify 200 response with correct post details including title, content, category, and author

title: Handle getPostById with non-existent post ID
description: Verify that request to getPostById with a UUID that does not exist gracefully results in frontend navigation to 404 page.

steps.description: Send getPostById request with non-existent UUID
Verify 404 response and frontend redirects to 404 not found page

title: Successful update of post by authenticated owner
description: Verify an authenticated user can update their own post fields (title, content, category) successfully with changes persisted and reflected in the UI.

steps.description: Authenticate user session owning the post
Submit updatePost request with valid changes and post ID owned by user
Verify response redirects to updated post detail page with status 303
Confirm UI updates reflect the new post data with no manual refresh required

title: Fail update post by non-owner due to RLS permission denial
description: Verify that attempts to update a post by a user who does not own it are rejected with error or result in no data changes due to Row Level Security enforcement.

steps.description: Authenticate user session different from post owner
Attempt updatePost request on post ID not owned by the user
Verify error response or 500 status indicating permission denied
Verify no changes were applied to post data

title: Fail update post with invalid input data
description: Verify that updating a post with invalid or empty required fields returns validation errors before database update.

steps.description: Authenticate user session owning the post
Submit updatePost request with empty title field
Check for validation error on missing title
Submit updatePost request with empty content field
Check for validation error on missing content

title: Successful deletion of post by authenticated owner
description: Verify that an authenticated owner can delete their post successfully and that the deletion is reflected on UI via updated post lists.

steps.description: Authenticate user session owning the post
Send deletePost request with valid post ID and associated category
Verify 200 response confirming deletion
Confirm the post is removed from category listing in the UI without manual refresh

title: Prevent deletion of post by non-owner due to RLS
description: Verify that an authenticated user who does not own the post cannot delete it, and receives appropriate error or no data deletion occurs due to Row Level Security.

steps.description: Authenticate user session who is not owner
Attempt deletePost request on post ID not owned
Verify error or 500 response indicating lack of permission
Verify the post remains unchanged in database and UI

title: Handle deletion of non-existent post gracefully
description: Verify that deletePost requests for a post ID that does not exist return appropriate error messages and do not cause unintended effects.

steps.description: Authenticate user session
Send deletePost request with non-existent post ID
Verify error response indicating post not found or similar

title: Cache invalidation and revalidation after post creation
description: Verify that after successful creation of a post, the community listing and detail pages revalidate data so UI reflects new posts immediately.

steps.description: Create a new post as authenticated user
Verify that community listing page caches are invalidated and refreshed automatically
Verify that the new post appears in relevant category views without manual refresh

title: Cache invalidation and revalidation after post update
description: Verify that after a post update, related pages revalidate content to immediately reflect updated data in the UI.

steps.description: Update a post as authenticated owner
Verify cache invalidation triggers on community listing and post detail pages
Confirm updated post data is shown immediately in the UI

title: Handle database connectivity failure gracefully
description: Verify that database connectivity issues during post creation, update, deletion, or fetch result in clear and user-friendly error messages without application crashes.

steps.description: Simulate database connectivity failure
Attempt createPost, updatePost, deletePost, and getPostsByCategory requests
Verify that each operation returns appropriate error messages describing system failures
